instructionText: Fata cyangwa uhitemo ifoto kugira ngo umenye indwara z'ibihingwa
aboutDescription: Sisitemu y'Ubuhinzi Ishingiye kuri AI yo Gucunga Ibihingwa mu Rwanda
aboutContent: Iyi porogaramu ikoresha ikoranabuhanga mu gusuzuma no gutanga inama ku ndwara z'ibihingwa.
noteContent: Iyi ni verisiyo ya MVP. Kugira ngo ubone ibisubizo byiza, fatisha ifoto mu mucyo mwiza kandi uyifate neza.
